markdownRemark.html: This club has been around for 40 years and is dedicated to training and educating children from all over Almeria. Their facilities includes 14 tennis courts -8 clay courts and 6 fast tracks, 2 fronton courts which is also available as fast tracks, 1 football field with natural grass, 1 multisport court, a gym, a yoga and pilates room, 2 summer pools, a childrens play park, 3 terraces and a social lounge for children and adults. The club also have a Restaurant and Cafeteria where you can have a bite to eat after your exercise.

frontmatter.title: Club de Tenis

Their facilities includes 14 tennis courts -8 clay courts and 6 fast tracks, 2 fronton courts which is also available as fast tracks, 1 football field with natural grass, 1 multisport court, a gym, a yoga and pilates room, 2 summer pools, a childrens play park, 3 terraces and a social lounge for children and adults. The club also have a Restaurant and Cafeteria where you can have a bite to eat after your exercise.
frontmatter.address: Av. de la Alpujarra, 5, 04230 Huércal de Almería, Almería
tags: Top things to do with kids in Almeria
